dict.string: if grep <<<${TM_CURRENT_WORD:-!} -Esq '^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$' then if URL=`grep -i "^$TM_CURRENT_WORD=" "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/documentation.txt"` then URL=${URL:${#TM_CURRENT_WORD}+1} else URL="function.${TM_CURRENT_WORD//_/-}" fi if [[ "$PHP_MANUAL_LOCATION" ]] then if [[ ! -d "$PHP_MANUAL_LOCATION" ]] then exit_show_tool_tip "Your PHP_MANUAL_LOCATION directory ($PHP_MANUAL_LOCATION) does not exist. See the bundle Help for setup instructions." fi if [[ ! -f "$PHP_MANUAL_LOCATION/$URL.html" ]] then exit_show_tool_tip "No documentation found for '$TM_CURRENT_WORD'" fi URL="file://$PHP_MANUAL_LOCATION/$URL.html" else URL="http://php.net/manual/en/$URL.php" fi exit_show_html "<meta http-equiv='Refresh' content='0;URL=$URL'>" else echo "Nothing to lookup (hint: place the caret on a function name)" fi
